result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: The incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ga: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.orig: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.html: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ponchtml: Iarsma den tseanré a ḃí san eaċtra a ṫarlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.orig: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.html: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ponchtml: Traiḋfil blianta ó ẛin ḃíoṫas ag caint ar ḃreacaḋ ré úr do na meáin ċumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
